Dating: LATE PERIOD (not before); PTOLEMAIC PERIOD (not after)
Name: Model of a capital
Description: This sculptors model shows a whole decorated capital, together with the upper part of a column.The trunk is composed of eight bundles, bound by a horizontal band. Four of the bundles terminate in large flowers that constitute the corners of the capital. The others are carried on by flowers of half height. On the capital we find a square abacus decorated with a grid engraved in the stone.
